mainTask.title: HT-028: Simple Production Deployment & Quality Assurance
mainTask.description:
SIMPLE PRODUCTION DEPLOYMENT: Build streamlined production deployment system with quality assurance, monitoring, and operational excellence for agency custom micro-app toolkit.

**Mission:** Create a practical production deployment system that ensures reliable custom micro-app delivery, basic quality assurance, and operational excellence for ≤7-day deployment capability using AI assistance.

**Scope:** Simple production deployment pipeline, basic quality assurance automation, monitoring and observability, operational runbooks, and straightforward delivery optimization for client micro-apps.

**Methodology:** AUDIT → DECIDE → APPLY → VERIFY with 10+ deployment verification checkpoints, quality assurance testing, and operational validation.

**Business Impact:**
- Enable reliable custom micro-app deployment and delivery
- Ensure basic quality assurance and testing
- Provide operational excellence and monitoring for clients
- Reduce deployment risks and operational issues
- Create maintainable deployment pipeline for agency scalability
